name: Soulstice (itch)
description:
PLAY FULLSCREEN

How to play: 
-Move with A and D
-Attack with SPACE
-Charge with S (when on the sigil)

Attack the monsters to steal their souls, you can carry a max of 3 (over your head). Use these souls to charge up the fire before the time runs out. You must be on the sigil to charge the fire and you cannot move or attack while charging. You can pick up stopwatches, that give you more time.

Made for Mini jam 90: illusion
Credits:
